{"id":344445788,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 3 months","timestamp":1590411345,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/344445788/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int start =0;\n        int end =0;\n        map <char,int > m;\n        map <char,int>::iterator it;\n        int max_len=0;\n        while(end <s.size()){\n            char c = s[end];\n            // check if character exits in the map  and the index is within range\n            it =m.find(c);\n            if(it!=m.end() && start <=it->second){ // it->econd > start means that this character already exits in the window (start,...,end)\n                \n             start =it->second+1;   \n            }\n            m[c]=end++;\n            max_len =max(max_len,end-start);\n        }\n        return max_len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
